NAME star piece
DLG ITM_0

DLG SPR_0
the earth is an intresting place to look. they thought that we are "symbols","zodiacs",ect.

DLG SPR_1
g-gah...

DLG SPR_2
i saw a star got hit by a rocket! it was horrible!

DLG SPR_3
oH GOD!

DLG ITM_0
you found a dead star bodypart. ugh...

END 0
"john! we trapped the star creature!" you heard them shouting the next thing you know is youre in the operating table. they cut you open while youre alive , thus killing you.

VAR a
42
